Texts.Chs: 有意思。这种液体可以恢复机甲的能量，而不会损坏机甲。
Texts.Eng: Curious. This liquid appears to be restoring your mechs energy, rather than causing negative effects.

Texts.Chs: 危险！硫酸已经破坏了机甲的电镀外层。我建议你立即离开。
Texts.Eng: DANGER! Sulphuric acid has compromised your mech plating. I suggest leaving the liquid immediately.

Texts.Chs: 危险！远古液正在让机甲变得脆弱！请赶快离开。
Texts.Eng: DANGER! The Elder Fluid is rapidly turning your mech into pudding! Get out swiftly!

Texts.Chs: 危险！你现在接触的这种液体可以使机甲系统短路。我建议你马上离开。
Texts.Eng: DANGER! This fluid is rapidly shorting out every system on board the mech. We should leave this liquid soon or risk death.

Texts.Chs: 危险！毒液已经渗入你机甲的零件中，这样会造成不可避免的损坏。你应该快点离开此地。
Texts.Eng: DANGER! This poisonous water seems to seep into your mechs components and cause serious issues. You should get out sooner than later.

Texts.Chs: 危险！机甲温控系统已损坏！请立即离开机甲！
Texts.Eng: DANGER! Your mech's temperature control systems are failing! Evacuate immediately!

Texts.Chs: 危险！液氮会固定机甲的各个运动部件，这并不是一件有意思的事，请赶快离开！
Texts.Eng: DANGER! Your mechs servos and components are rapidly freezing within the liquid nitrogen. That isn't a good thing. Evacuate soon or you will know regret.

Texts.Chs: 在这个失重的地方，敌人也出没于其中。我的数据表面，击败它们你可能会获得一些可供机甲吸收的能量。
Texts.Eng: Hostile entities also exist in zero-gravity environments. My cosmonautical records indicate that defeating them may result in obtaining an energy battery, which your mech can absorb.

Texts.Chs: 我在这艘船上收到一些不寻常的讯息。请小心。
Texts.Eng: I am recieving some unusual bio-signatures on this ship. Sufficient caution is recommended.

Texts.Chs: 正在进行初步环境扫描......即使你驾驶了机甲，该区域还是过于危险，请谨慎行事。
Texts.Eng: Initial environmental scans indicate that this area is particularly hazardous, even when in a mech. Caution is advised.

Texts.Chs: 请留意机甲能量，你可以从机甲头上的^#60b8ea;蓝色显示条^white;看到其多少，机甲能量除了会随时间所减少，另外当你的机甲受到伤害时也会消耗。
Texts.Eng: Please be aware of your mech's energy reserves, visualised as the ^#60b8ea;blue bar^white; you can see above your vehicle. Your mech's energy will deplete over time or when the vehicle takes damage.

Texts.Chs: 机甲过大，无法通行，我建议你按^#71f2f6;[E]^white;离开机甲步行过去。
Texts.Eng: The mech is too large to continue through this area. ^#71f2f6;Press E to enter and exit the mech^white; - I advise that you proceed on foot.

Texts.Chs: 我的计算得出，这些目标可以使用机甲上配备的武器所摧毁，摧毁之后才能通过该区域。
Texts.Eng: These targets can be destroyed with your mech's primary weapon. My probability matrix has concluded that destroying them may allow you to progress.

Texts.Chs: 这似乎是一个旧式星球资料储存库。不过我的资料库里面没有它的信息。
Texts.Eng: This appears to be an old Terrene Protectorate Storage Facility. No such place exists on my records.

Texts.Chs: 很高兴你通过了^green;Akaggy博士的高级测试^white;，你应该向他回报结果。
Texts.Eng: This teleporter indicates that ^green;you have completed Dr. Akaggy's advanced test course^white;. You should report back to her.

Texts.Chs:
警告：你的载具无法豁免由^#00BFFF;冷^reset;产生的影响！
不顾该警告信息将可能导致驾驶员死亡或无法获得该载具的保修报销。
Texts.Eng:
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified 
for this ^#00BFFF;cold^reset; environment!
Disregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.

Texts.Chs:
警告：你的载具无法豁免由^#00FF00;辐射^reset;产生的影响！
不顾该警告信息将可能导致驾驶员死亡或无法获得该载具的保修报销。
Texts.Eng:
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified 
for this ^#00FF00;radioactive^reset; environment!
Disregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.

不顾该警告信息将可能导致驾驶员死亡或无法获得该载具的保修报销。
Texts.Eng:

for this ^#6A5ACD;electric^reset; environment!
Disregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.

不顾该警告信息将可能导致驾驶员死亡或无法获得该载具的保修报销。
Texts.Eng:
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified 
for this ^#9ACD32;proto^reset; environment!
Disregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.

Texts.Chs:
警告：你的载具无法豁免由^#A0522D;压强^reset;产生的影响！
不顾该警告信息将可能导致驾驶员死亡或无法获得该载具的保修报销。
Texts.Eng:
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified 
for this ^#A0522D;high pressure^reset; environment!
Disregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.

Texts.Chs:
警告：你的载具无法豁免由^#FF1493;奇怪^reset;产生的影响！
不顾该警告信息将可能导致驾驶员死亡或无法获得该载具的保修报销。
Texts.Eng:
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified 
for this ^#FF1493;weird^reset; environment!
Disregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.

Texts.Chs:
警告：你的载具无法豁免由^#FF4500;热^reset;产生的影响！
不顾该警告信息将可能导致驾驶员死亡或无法获得该载具的保修报销。
Texts.Eng:
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified 
for this ^#FF4500;hot^reset; environment!
Disregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.

Texts.Chs: 你现在已经进入失重环境。你正在驾驶的机甲是唯一的移动工具，我建议你不要离开它。
Texts.Eng: You are now suspended in a zero-gravity environment. The mech you are piloting is designed to travel through space - I would strongly advise that you do not attempt to exit the vehicle for now.

Texts.Chs: 当处于重力空间时，你的机甲会自动切换到步行模式。我建议你不要随意离开机甲。
Texts.Eng: Your mech switches to a ground-movement configuration when in an environment with gravity. I would advise you continue to proceed in your mech.

Texts.Chs: 你完成了^green;Akaggy博士的高级测试^white;，但是我还是没有得出这艘飞船到底是因何被遗弃的。
Texts.Eng: ^green;You appear to have completed Dr. Akaggy's test course^white;. I must declare that I am curious as to how such a large ship came to be abandoned, but my records present no conclusion.
